entities.name: security desk

entities.name: telephone box
entities.description: Harry and his friends are inside a telephone box that is sinking into the ground.

relationships.description: The security desk is located at the far end of the Atrium within the Ministry.
Visitors are required to submit to a search and present their wand for registration at the Ministry.
